description: ff. 14. 187 x 138; 143 x 105 mm. 17 lin. 15th cen. - on last fol. samāʻ of ʻAbd al-Raḥīm ibn al-Qalqashandī (d. 820/1417: Sakhāwī, al-Ḍawʼ al-lāmiʻ (1353-55 H.), IV, 184). Riwāyah of Abū Muslim Ibrāhīm ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Muslim al-Kajjī al-Baṣrī (the title page gives the names of five other ruwāh in descending order). Incip.: ... اخبرنا الشىخة الصالحة المعمرة ام ىوسف زىنب بنت عبد الرحمن السکرىة
author: Anṣārī, Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh, 736 or 7-830
title: Juzʼ fīhi aḥādīth Abī ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn al-Muthanná ibn Anas ibn Mālik al-Anṣārī... ʻan shuyūkhihi
contributor: Kajjī, Ibrāhīm ibn ʻAbd Allāh, 807 or 808-904
creator: Anṣārī, Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh, 736 or 7-830
subject: Hadith—Texts—Early works to 1800
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
